TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 49, "index": 10}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 18, "index": 25}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 11, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft oak_wood, I need to place two logs side by side. Therefore, I will move one log from slot 23 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 49, "index": 10}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 18, "index": 25}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 11, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}]
thought: Now that one log has been placed in the crafting grid, I need to place another log next to it. Therefore, I will move another log from slot 23 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 49, "index": 10}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 18, "index": 25}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 11, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}]
thought: Now that two logs have been placed in the crafting grid, I need to place another two logs below them. Therefore, I will move another log from slot 23 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 49, "index": 10}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 18, "index": 25}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 11, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}]

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 49, "index": 10}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 26, "index": 12}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "polished_granite_slab", "quantity": 29, "index": 24}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 18, "index": 25}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 11, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 41, "index": 38}]
thought: Now that the oak_wood has been crafted, I need to move it to an empty slot in my inventory. Therefore, I will move the oak_wood from slot 0 to slot 13.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 3
